trans-unit.source: Decrypts Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) key exchange data.
trans-unit.target: Desencripta os dados de troca de chaves de preenchimento encriptação assimétrico ideal (OAEP).

trans-unit.source: Key exchange allows a sender to create secret information, for example, random data that can be used as a key in a symmetric encryption algorithm, and use encryption to send it to the intended recipient.
trans-unit.target: Troca de chaves permite um remetente para criar informações secretas, por exemplo, dados aleatórios que podem ser utilizados como uma chave de um algoritmo de encriptação simétrica e utilizam encriptação para enviá-lo para o destinatário pretendido.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeFormatter> to create the key exchange message with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeFormatter>para criar a mensagem de troca de chaves com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>algoritmo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeFormatter>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > It is highly recommended that you not attempt to create your own key exchange method from the basic functionality provided, because many details of the operation must be performed carefully in order for the key exchange to be successful.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Recomenda vivamente que não tentar criar o seu próprio método de troca de chaves da funcionalidade básica fornecida, porque muitas detalhes da operação tem de ser efetuados cuidadosamente a ordem para a troca de chaves com êxito.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.SetKey%2A> to establish the key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.SetKey%2A>para estabelecer a chave antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.SetKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"> </xref> classe com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: A instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> algoritmo que contém a chave privada.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: key is .

trans-unit.source: Extracts secret information from the encrypted key exchange data.
trans-unit.target: Extrai informações secretas dos dados de troca de chaves encriptada.

trans-unit.source: You must specify a key before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Tem de especificar uma chave antes de chamar este método.

trans-unit.source: The key exchange data within which the secret information is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de troca de chaves no qual as informações secretas está oculto.

trans-unit.source: The secret information derived from the key exchange data.
trans-unit.target: As informações secretas derivam os dados de troca de chaves.

trans-unit.source: The key exchange data verification has failed.
trans-unit.target: Falhou a verificação de dados de troca de chaves.

trans-unit.source: The key is missing.
trans-unit.target: A chave está em falta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters for the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) key exchange.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os parâmetros para a troca de chaves de preenchimento encriptação assimétrico ideal (OAEP).

trans-unit.source: An XML string containing the parameters of the OAEP key exchange operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia XML que contém os parâmetros da operação de troca de chaves OAEP.

trans-unit.source: Sets the private key to use for decrypting the secret information.
trans-unit.target: Define a chave privada a utilizar para desencriptar as informações secretas.

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de definir uma chave antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: A instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> algoritmo que contém a chave privada.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .
